column4: That's not me. This guy is using my nick with an underscore in the end.
That's my brother and he has to have my nick. What do I do?
And since we're on a lan, on wan side, we
are supposed to have the same ID.
irc allows spawning and destruction of channels
just join a randomly named channel and it will be made
and if yuo use tab you can complete my name quicker and accurately
Oh, I can train him offline. That's not the problem. But I want it to know about different kinds of people.
get it set up and i'll mosey on in
Awesome! Now here comes the problem....
then you need to tweak more
And does not work with any commands listed in the source. Of course, I didn't read the whole source yet.
Then it seems, it's going to be quite some work trying to tweak it.
then setting up the channel to test something you know is broken is pointless
